preferences.name: selectByRanking
preferences.title: Select by Ranking
preferences.label: Use the highest ranked server for location
preferences.description: If enabled, the highest ranked server for the given location will be used when a location is selected. If no server is ranked, Mullvad will determine the server used.

preferences.title: Confirm Location Change

preferences.description: If enabled, a confirmation dialog is shown to confirm any location change.
